import { Tabs, Callout } from 'nextra/components'

# Fetch Block Range for Proof Submission

Use this endpoint to get the range of blocks against which proofs can be submitted for state updates.
Returns an array of the most recent block hashes (up to 32 blocks).

### Params

- None

### Response

- Array of block hashes (hex-encoded) representing the valid range for proof submission

### Example Request

```bash
curl "https://dev.nexus.avail.tools/range"
```

<details className="border p-3 rounded-md bg-[#EFF6FF]">
<summary> Sample Response:</summary>
